Name: Allan
description:
Allan is a farmer who deals with bananas and cattle fattening.

Allan is a self-driven and self-employed farmer, living in Ntungamo with his wife and children. He grows bananas, which he sells to food markets to earn income for his family's survival. In addition to income generation, food supply at home is also guaranteed. Therefore, Allan kills two birds with one stone.

He has applied for a loan to buy fertilizer for his banana farm. He is hopeful that his yields will increase, which will bring in higher profits. Allan is once more grateful for the financial support.
